lessons.title: Memory Module Stability Best Practices
lessons.guideline: Always test memory operations in isolation before integration. Use proper async handling and error recovery.
examples: Handle async operations with proper event loop checks
Implement fallback mechanisms for failed operations
lessons.safety_notes: Memory operations are critical - always have backup and recovery mechanisms
lessons.success_criteria: All memory tests pass with 100% success rate

lessons.title: Robust Error Handling in AgentDev
lessons.guideline: Implement comprehensive error handling with proper logging and recovery mechanisms.
examples: Use try-catch blocks around critical operations
Provide fallback behaviors for common failures
lessons.safety_notes: Never let unhandled exceptions crash the system
lessons.success_criteria: Zero unhandled exceptions in production logs
